WizardItems.Title: Real-time help
WizardItems.Description: To add your booking to the app, you'll need your booking reference. This booking reference (DNR) is a 7-letter code which you can find on the confirmation page or in your confirmation email. Add a ticket by entering the booking reference (DNR) and the email address used to make the booking. You'll find all ticket info for each booking reference number (DNR) via "My tickets".
